data.title: Stephen Silas: Breaking News, Rumors & Highlights
data.meta_description: Stephen Silas rumors, news and videos from the best sources on the web.
data.text:
Former Rockets Coach Reportedly Leaves Detroit Pistons

Soon, the Detroit Pistons will finalize their coaching staff under J.B. Bickerstaff. According to The Athletic’s James Edwards III, former Houston Rockets head coach Stephen Silas is not expected to be a part of the staff.

Rockets Offseason Move Proves to be Even More Brilliant

Last offseason, the Houston Rockets had a major decision to make. They needed a head coach. Better yet, they needed the right coach. They had Stephen Silas, who was known to be an offensive guru, based on his tenure with the Dallas Mavericks, however, it's a bit different without Luka Doncic.

Jacque Vaughn's Tenure With Nets Resembles Former Rockets Coach Stephen Silas

When Jacque Vaughn replaced Steve Nash as coach of the Brooklyn Nets in November 2022, the purpose was to help the franchise reach its championship potential with Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving.

Ime Udoka and his quartet of vets

When he took over as Rockets head coach, Ime Udoka knew he needed experienced players to set strong examples at the top of the roster.

Coach Stephen Silas 'Proud' of Players' Growth

When the final buzzer rung Monday night inside the Toyota Center, the Houston Rockets had ended a three-game losing skid in a 136-113 victory over the Detroit Pistons.

Opening Night Flop For Rockets

Since replacing Stephen Silas as coach of the Houston Rockets, Ime Udoka spent the previous six months preaching his desire to break bad habits that led to the franchise winning 59 games since the 2020-21 season.

Rockets' Udoka Highlights Essential Task

The Houston Rockets began revamping their franchise minutes after concluding the 2022-23 campaign. A 22-60 record led management to depart from Stephen Silas as coach on April 9.

Rockets Ex Stephen Silas Great Hire For Pistons' Coach Monty Williams

Former coach Stephen Silas took his spot on the Houston Rockets' podium ahead of a mid-season contest against the Dallas Mavericks during the 2021-22 campaign.

Stephen Silas to Join Pistons’ Monty Williams as Lead Assistant

Former Rockets coach Stephen Silas is joining Monty Williams and the Pistons as a lead assistant, per Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN. Williams was hired by

Stephen Silas agrees to join Pistons as assistant coach

Former Houston Rockets head coach Stephen Silas will become the top assistant to Monty Williams with the Pistons.

Rockets Coach Ime Udoka Hires Three Assistants From Celtics Staff

Coach Ime Udoka is finalizing his staff as coach of the Houston Rockets. The Boston Globe was the first to report Udoka has hired Aaron Miles, Mike Moser and Ben Sullivan to join his staff in Houston.

2023 NBA Draft: Rockets Held Pre-Draft Workouts With Kansas State's Markquis Nowell

The Houston Rockets are determined not to finish the 2023-24 season at the bottom of the league for the fourth consecutive year. Owner Tilman Fertitta

2023 NBA Draft: Rockets Have Met With Several Prospects For Pre-Draft Workouts

The Houston Rockets are determined not to finish the 2023-24 season at the bottom of the league for the fourth consecutive year. Owner Tilman Fertitta

Rockets Mahmoud Abdelfattah, John Lucas II Early Favorites For Ime Udoka's Coaching Staff

Ime Udoka is putting together his first coaching staff as coach of the Houston Rockets. General manager Rafael Stone said he would "encourage" the next head coach to look at Stephen Silas' previous staff for potential holdovers.

Rockets move on from coach Stephen Silas

Houston is moving in from head coach Stephen Silas, declining his contract option for the 2023-24 season. The Rockets are tied with the Detroit Pistons and San Antonio Spurs for the best odds -- 14 percent -- to get the No.

Pistons and Rockets opt to move on from head coaches

The Detroit Pistons and Houston Rockets have both parted ways with their respective head coaches.

Rockets make decision on future of head coach Stephen Silas

The Rockets are planning to decline the fourth-year option on Stephen Silas’ contract, ESPN’s Adrian Wojnarowski reports.

Report: One Western Conference head coach expected to be let go after season

At least one NBA head coach appears to be entering his final days in his current job.

As Uncertainty Looms, Rockets Continue To Play Hard For Stephen Silas: 'This Was Big For Coach'

In his third season as coach of the Houston Rockets, Stephen Silas has not been shy when expressing the difficulties of the 2022-23 campaign. "This is a hard job, and there have been some down times that I’ve had to fight through the last three years," Silas said.

HC Stephen Silas discusses future with Rockets amid hot-seat talk

Silas was hired with a four-year contract, but this is the last season that the contract is guaranteed. The rebuilding Rockets had the league’s second-worst record at 19-60 entering play on Tuesday.

Troubling report emerges about Rockets HC Stephen Silas

The Houston Rockets are the worst team in the Western Conference this season, and that might actually be underselling their many issues.

Spurs Coach Gregg Popovich Says Patience Is Key For Rockets' Stephen Silas

A win streak has been rare for Houston Rockets coach Stephen Silas over the previous three seasons. But when he left the Toyota Center Sunday night, Silas had a chance to enjoy the Rockets' second consecutive win following a 142-110 victory over the San Antonio Spurs.

Rockets' Young Corps Leaves Daunting Challenge For Stephen Silas In Final 24 Games

The third year of coach Stephen Silas' tenure with the Houston Rockets may have been his hardest. He hoped the Rockets would be an improved team during training camp in September.

Watch: Stephen Silas shares hug with Monty Williams in moving moment

Houston Rockets head coach Stephen Silas shared a very touching moment with Phoenix Suns counterpart Monty Williams after Tuesday’s game.

Former NBA player and coach Paul Silas dies at 79

Longtime NBA player and coach Paul Silas has died, tweets Bob Ryan of The Boston Globe. The 79-year-old was a rugged rebounder and defender during his 16 NBA seasons.
